html:
1.20.21  5:13 am   I've made music in the past and recently fell out of it. I'm more motivated to make some now, but i dont know where to gather inspiration from to actually be able to make lyrics and all. Do you have ANY tips or anything?

      if you want it bad enough, it will happen

1.20.21  4:33 am   What do you like about making songs?

      how impossible and fun it can be

1.20.21  4:30 am   why did you want to learn 3D editing instead of stick with the same old?

     the same old was discontinued in 2012 and stopped working on any new computers after 2016

     Btw love the new style keep it up! That is if you stick with 3D editing....

1.20.21  4:21 am   will you ever use a capital letter to start a sentence?

      sure. i tend to use this when there's multiple sentences

1.20.21  4:10 am   what made you choose 3d for "here comes the sun"? did you have experience beforehand or was it your first time trying it?

      i didn't really choose 3D for here comes the sun. i chose 3D first, for videos in general, then just at the last minute when it was about to ruin my whole life, i scrambled to make some songs. with videos of course

1.20.21  3:19 am   I recently found out that there is some longstanding controversy about what tempo Beethoven compositions should be played. Some think he meant them to be very fast, some think rather slow, and there are a bunch in the middle of the road. Do you have a preference, or what do you think about the whole situation?

      always put bpm at the top of the page

1.20.21  3:05 am   Are you working on a new song Right Now?

      working on the video for it

1.20.21  2:49 am   Do you have to know music theory to make music

      other way around

1.20.21  2:48 am   whats your opinion on strange chords?

      all chords are strange

1.20.21  2:43 am   How long has the "here comes the sun" song been fully complete?

     since sept 15, 2020

     Was there a period when work on the song and video overlapped? 

     no

1.20.21  1:16 am   out of all of your music videos, what would you say was the weirdest

      i have never made a weird video

1.20.21  12:53 am   would you consider sincerity essential in art?

      could be worth a try

1.20.21  12:45 am   can you please make a song that sounds like the "I'm riding a ponyyy" part of mount st. helens is about to blow up many people would like it maybe I think

      sure, i have one about shelves

1.20.21  12:00 am   Do You think it is good to let nature take its course? 

      nature will decide on its own course

1.19.21  11:56 pm   what is the weirdest song you have ever written?

      i have never written a weird song

1.19.21  11:16 pm   Are we human or are we dancer?

      dancer for sure

1.19.21  11:07 pm   im almost certain you've been asked this before, but how do you create your more educational videos?

      first i try to learn the thing, by figuring out why i care. then i try to imagine why anyone else should care, based on remembering my own cares for it

1.19.21  11:05 pm   What style of music do you listen to

     regular

      and what would you recommend?

     normal

1.19.21  10:29 pm   What is your favorite pasta shape?

      -

1.19.21  10:00 pm   I have been asking this for a decade now. Who let the dogs out?

      i think the more important question is who imprisoned the dogs in the first place

1.19.21  9:39 pm   Are your vocals fed through auto-harmonizing software,

     no

      or do you record each layer of the harmonics independently?

     i sing all the tracks separately

1.19.21  9:28 pm   what are your thoughts about flat earthers

      they are flat

1.19.21  9:06 pm   Do you know you're awesome? Also, where did you learn 3D animation to make your a w e s o m e new video?

      at home, and in the workplace

1.19.21  9:01 pm   are you warning us about the sun because some of your songs have a lot of sun

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

1.19.21  8:36 pm   I've heard from your earlier questions that you started the song in 2010.  Do you ever worry that old half finished lyrics will become outdated?

      not since i learned how to change them

1.19.21  8:27 pm   whats your favorite song youve made so far?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.19.21  8:27 pm   what inspires your songs?

      everything i've ever known, heard, or seen, or imagined

1.19.21  8:02 pm   why do all of your songs talk about love

      it's everywhere

1.19.21  7:52 pm   Why did you take that long of a break from making songs?

      to learn how to make videos for them

1.19.21  7:41 pm   have you ever finished writing a song you didn't like just for the sake of finishing it

      only if i am allowed to make it good

1.19.21  7:16 pm   opinion on the windows key? 

      good strong key

1.19.21  7:07 pm   that part at the end of here comes the sun where it goes from e major to a minor all of a sudden is soooo perfect and i just cannot stop listening to that section. i just wanted you to know

      holy smokes you are very friendly

1.19.21  6:43 pm   are you best friends with your own front door

      sort of

1.19.21  6:12 pm   dose the 3d video have advanced ray tracing light? 

      not even close

1.19.21  6:05 pm   can you give me tips on how to read your handwriting?

      write your own handwriting, and read that instead

1.19.21  5:56 pm   why are you so overwhelmingly normal?

      for bureaucratic purposes

1.19.21  5:52 pm   When did the idea for doing a video in 3d occur to you?

      probably in the summer of 16, when writing history of the entire world

1.19.21  5:49 pm   why is the world in so many of your songs and videos?

      can't stop thinking about it

1.19.21  5:47 pm   new song is very good. when is your next song gonna. be

      right away

1.19.21  5:44 pm   do you plan on re-making la de da de da de da de day oh in 3d?

     there's many other things i have yet to make for the first time, so i should take care of those first, then maybe circle back for the re-makes

     if not i understand but i think it would look amazing

1.19.21  5:38 pm   do you like the music or the video more for here comes the sun

      neither is as good as the way i imagined it

1.19.21  5:37 pm   whats your opinion on the universe 

      never heard of it

1.19.21  5:30 pm   How do you manage to get through life with (presumably) no issues? 

      by hiding the issues, so you will therefore presume the issues are not there

1.19.21  5:19 pm   Have you ever thought about not thinking?

      yes

1.19.21  5:12 pm   opinions on the default cube?

      it's bigger than you might think

1.19.21  5:11 pm   Have you ever inserted nonsensical lyrics?

     i try not to

     Or do all your lyrics have meaning behind them

     they are supposed to

     (such as "the building wonder if they'll ever be built")

     that's a reference to the timeless adage, "why is it called a building if it's already built." which, believe it or not, i picked up from this page

1.19.21  5:09 pm   WHat's your favorite time signature?

      regular

1.19.21  5:01 pm   Why did you make history of japan before history of the entire world, i guess?

      as a warmup

1.19.21  4:52 pm   what's your opinion on the french horn

      curvacious

1.19.21  4:50 pm   what should i make a video on?

      common sense
